Ability.Description: Increases damage of non-physical attacks by 5%. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Increases Armor by 1%.
Increases Armor by 2%.

Reduces the Power cost of Blood Fever, Soul Sickness, Necrotic Wounds and Flesh Rot by 3. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 1%.
Reduces the Power cost of Blood Fever, Soul Sickness, Necrotic Wounds and Flesh Rot by 6. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 2%.
Reduces the Power cost of Blood Fever, Soul Sickness, Necrotic Wounds and Flesh Rot by 9. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 3%.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 1% and causes Ravaging Strike to reduce the target's armor based on the rank of Ravaging Strike used for 15 seconds.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 2% and causes Ravaging Strike to reduce the target's armor based on the rank of Ravaging Strike used for 15 seconds.
Increases the damage of all attacks by 3% and causes Ravaging Strike to reduce the target's armor based on the rank of Ravaging Strike used for 15 seconds.

For 15 seconds after killing an enemy you have Tagged, healing from Soul Feast is increased by an additional 50%. Deals 50% of your weapon's damage to up to 10 surrounding enemies when the Tagged enemy dies.

For 15 seconds after killing an enemy you have Tagged, healing from Soul Feast is increased by an additional 100%. Deals 100% of your weapon's damage to up to 10 surrounding enemies when the Tagged enemy dies.
Corruptions last an additional 4 seconds.
Corruptions last an additional 8 seconds.
Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 2%.
Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 4%.
Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 6%.
Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 8%.
Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 10%.

Increases the damage of Soul Sickness, Blood Fever, Necrotic Wounds, and Flesh Rot by 66%
Increases the damage of Soul Sickness, Blood Fever, Necrotic Wounds, and Flesh Rot by 100%
Increases the threat generation of all damage over time effects by 15%, modified by Endurance.

Ability.Description: Reduces damage taken by 30% for 6s. Shares a cooldown with Shield Defense. Does not stack with Aegis of Light, Crest of Consumption, or Power Shield.
Charges at the enemy and applies Soul Sickness, Blood Fever, Necrotic Wounds and Flesh Rot if they are known. Roots for 2s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Enemies affected by Infestation or Explosive Infestation take 5% more damage from your Death based attacks. Increases damage done by your Death based attacks by 3%.
Enemies affected by Infestation or Explosive Infestation take 10% more damage from your Death based attacks. Increases damage done by your Death based attacks by 6%.
Enemies affected by Infestation or Explosive Infestation take 15% more damage from your Death based attacks. Increases damage done by your Death based attacks by 9%.
Enemies affected by Infestation or Explosive Infestation take 20% more damage from your Death based attacks. Increases damage done by your Death based attacks by 12%.
Enemies affected by Infestation or Explosive Infestation take 25% more damage from your Death based attacks. Increases damage done by your Death based attacks by 15%.
Soul Sickness, Blood Fever, Necrotic Wounds and Flesh Rot heal you 3% of the damage done by their damage over time effects.
Increases the healing of Soul Feast by 100%.

Ability.Description: Deals 361 Death damage over 15s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Reduces the cooldown of Infestation, and Explosive Infestation by 5 seconds. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 2%.
Reduces the cooldown of Infestation, and Explosive Infestation by 10 seconds. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Infestation, and Explosive Infestation by 15 seconds. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 6%.

Ability.Description:
Corrupts the ground at the Warrior's current position for 30s, up to 10 enemies within the corruption take Death damage every 3 seconds:
1 Point: 384 damage total. 2 Points: 508 damage total. 3 Points: 693 damage total.

Rank.Description: Unlocks Dire Corruption ability.

Ability.Description: Makes the enemy immune to all of the Warrior’s Reaver Damage Over Time abilities and Taunts for 5m. Does not work against players.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Immunization ability.

Ability.Description: Effects up to 5 enemies. After 8s, deals 258 Death damage, increased by 45% per damage over time effect on the Enemy, maximum of 5.

AbilityRank.Description: Makes the enemy immune to all of the Warrior’s Reaver Damage Over Time abilities and Taunts for 5m. Does not work against players.
Reduces incoming damage by 20% for 4s. Increases healing received by 20% for 15s. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.
Grants the effects of Binding of Shadow, Binding of Death, Binding of Affliction and Plague Bringer. Increases Endurance by 5%. Increases healing received by 5%. Lasts 1h.
Increases range of Shadow of Dread, Soul Sickness, Necrotic Wounds, Flesh Rot, Infestation, and Explosive Infestation by 10 meters. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 3%. Lasts 1h.
